extendedInfo.description: NO push notificationsNO spyware, NO malwareFree bonus - cracked glass and squashed mosquitoes backgrounds.Call the firefighters! There's a big ball of fire circling all around your device's background, and unless you're really careful, you can get your fingertips badly burnt next time you try to send a text message! Get the fire circle live wallpaper if you're an adventurer at heart - and keep the flame burning, even when you're doing the most boring everyday tasks.After the download you don't need internet connection to enjoy the application. This free app is ad supported. This application will not download videos from the internet. Download once and enjoy for ever.Note:Application can not be moved to SD card.Application is a live wallpaper, to access it on your phone, read your phone manual.Application is intended for display in portrait mode, it will work in landscape mode but display may not be optimal.Rotating the device while in preview of live wallpaper may cause application to crash.Application does not require internet access for primary usage, however internet connection may be required to access some functions (for instance link to More free apps and similar).
